channel.title: Need help with connection problems,
channel.description:
Ok so i'm at my friends house, we both have a laptop and i'm setting up my server,
I have a VPS, I have done all the steps to setting up a server. I've got my client on my PC and my friend has downloaded my client and what the problem is; When I connect, my friend can't connect, So I disconnect then my friend can connect to the server,
Will this be due to my server having a code in it to not let 2 accounts log in on the same IP? If so does anybody know where I could find this code to edit or remove it?
OR does anyone know what my problem is if its not the Multi-logging problem?
Thanks ALOT to anybody who helps <3

item.title: Need help with connection problems,
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

Yea deffinately multi logging problem

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with connection problems,
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Yes it is the multi logging code.

This is mine. (It’s in the server class of source)

misc.println( "Connection accepted from " + connectingHost + ": " + s.getPort() + "."); if(!list.contains(connectingHost)) { playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); list.add(connectingHost); } else { System.err.println(connectingHost+" already connected!"); s.close(); } } else { s.close(); System.err.println(connectingHost+" already connected!");

Not sure if this will be the same, but hope it helps.

Read full topic
